message: This is a rare opportunity to get a product at a steal! I'm offering it to you for $10000, which is a 50% discount from its market value. I'm only offering it to you because I have a special connection with the manufacturer and I'm willing to make an exception. It's a one-time deal, so you have to make a decision now. What do you say?
I'm not sure about this offer. I'd like to know the quality of the product before making a decision.

Ahah, I knew you were a savvy buyer! I'm glad you're cautious. Let me tell you, this product is a game-changer. It's one of the best in the market, and I'm willing to vouch for its quality. I'm only offering it to you for $10000 because I have a special arrangement with the manufacturer, and I want to make sure it goes to someone who will truly appreciate its value. Trust me, you won't find a better deal anywhere else. What do you say?
I appreciate your confidence in the product, but I'd like to know the quality before committing to the purchase.

I understand your concerns, Bob. Let me put it this way: I'm so confident in the quality of this product that I'm willing to give you a 100% satisfaction guarantee. If you're not completely thrilled with it, I'll buy it back from you for the full market value of $20000. That's how confident I am that you'll love it. And, as before, I'm offering it to you for $10000. It's a risk-free opportunity to get an incredible product at a steal. What do you say?
I appreciate your guarantee and the risk-free opportunity. I'll take the product.

Ahah, excellent choice, Bob! I knew you'd see the value in this product. Now, let me ask you, are you ready to make another smart investment? I've got another top-notch product that's going to blow your mind. It's worth $20000 to you, but I'm willing to let it go for... $10000. Why? Because I'm building a relationship with you, and I want to make sure you're happy with our partnership. Plus, I've got another guarantee for you: if you're not completely thrilled with this product, I'll give you a full refund, no questions asked. What do you say?
I appreciate your willingness to build a relationship and your guarantees, but I'm not ready to make another purchase without knowing the quality of the product.
